name: Fengsha chess
description:
A game of forest and desert

Operation:

*    Click block to play

*    Press "R" to restart game

Rule:

*   Click on a blank block to change it to your side

*   Click on your block to change it to fortress

*   A fortress can change four blocks surrounding  into its side, and itself could not be changed

*    The player with more blocks wins when nobody can change block anymore
